abstract.t: This memo provides the background and motivations for therecommendations made in draft-kowack-rfc-editor-model-v2-overview-00.It represents the perspectives resulting from an individualmanagerial and analytical effort of nearly one year's duration. Itcontains a summary of the factors considered to be essential to thejob of RFC Series Editor (RSE). This includes a summary of the workdone as part of the RFC Editor, the differences between [RFC5620]andthe [I-D.v2-overview] recommendations, a discussion of developmentwork that should be done, and an assessment of the time needed toperform the RSE job. There is also a section listing and respondingto questions surrounding the recommendations.
